column4: ok im getting an error when i try to install an mp3 player.....who can help me?
configure: error: *** GLIB >= 1.2.2 not installed - please install first ***
i tried apt-get install glib, but doesnt work
ok calm down people....im kinda new to linux
ok any other good mp3 player?
it says ubuntuguide.com cant find the server
you will also have to set xmms to use ESD instead of OSS
i have no idea what ESD and OSS are...again, im a n00bie
tell us when you're done installing
did you set the repositories correctly?
in other words, did you follow steps 1,2 and 3 in that link you wree given?
did you set it to ESD?
in xmms, go to Options -> Preferences, then pick eSound for Output Plugin
sorry...try another multimedia player, I guess
why don't you type out your whole question into one coherent sentence...it's much easier to follow that way
that sounds very strange. do you maybe have some magnetic device close to the monitor?
